item.title: 加拿大人口增长因打击临时居民而放缓
item.description: 由于移民人数减少，加拿大新增居民的速度是三年来最慢的，大流行病后的人口激增逐渐结束，这给经济造成了压力，也使公众对新移民的情绪变得低落。【原文：Canada added new residents at the slowest pace in three years due to falling immigration, winding down a post-pandemic population boom that strained the economy and soured public sentiment toward newcomers.】

item.title: 金多斯称欧洲央行的利率路径尚未确定
item.description: 欧洲央行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，全球的不确定性意味着欧洲央行无法预先承诺借贷成本的走向。【原文：Global uncertainty means the European Central Bank can’t precommit on where borrowing costs will go, according to Vice President Luis de Guindos.】

item.title: 菲律宾希望印度加入 "战队 "对抗中国
item.description: 据一位东南亚国家的高级军事官员称，菲律宾希望印度加入一个由美国支持的新兴军事联盟，以抵制中国在印度洋-太平洋地区日益高涨的强硬态度。【原文：The Philippines wants India to join an emerging US-backed military alliance to push back against China’s rising assertiveness in Indo-Pacific, according to a top military official from the Southeast Asian nation.】

item.title: 马斯克的 xAI 初创公司加入微软-黑岩 300 亿美元人工智能基金
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）是山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）的 OpenAI 公司的最大支持者，贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Microsoft Corp., the biggest backer of Sam Altman’s OpenAI, and BlackRock Inc., which has an executive on the artificial intelligence startup’s board, are joining forces with one of his chief rivals.】

item.title: 美国银行称英国应回购长期吉尔债券以缓解债务压力
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的研究人员认为，英国政府应彻底改变债务管理方式，回购长期债券。【原文：The UK government should radically alter its approach to debt management and buy back long-dated bonds, according to researchers at Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 高盛、杰富瑞下调评级，奥本海默称 M&A 反弹存疑
item.description: 据奥本海默公司（Oppenheimer & Co.【原文：The boom in M&A activity that dealmakers on Wall Street had hoped for after Donald Trump’s return to the White House may never materialize, according to Oppenheimer & Co.】

item.title: 军舰制造商巴布科克希望在防务股上涨之际晋升英国富时 100 指数
item.description: 随着欧洲加大安全支出，国防类股票纷纷反弹，英国军舰制造商巴布科克国际集团（Babcock International Group Plc）将重新加入富时 100 指数。【原文：British warship maker Babcock International Group Plc is set to rejoin the FTSE 100 index amid a rally in defense stocks as Europe ramps up security spending.】

item.title: 夜视镜制造商成为欧洲国防事业的亿万富翁
item.description: 去年年底，克里斯蒂安-哈吉米纳斯（Christian Hadjiminas）对其军事装备公司的股价感到不满。这位前菲布罗-所罗门（Phibro-Salomon）商品交易商现在更开心了，也更富有了。【原文：Christian Hadjiminas was disgruntled with his military equipment company’s share price at the end of last year. The former Phibro-Salomon commodities trader is now happier — and richer.】

item.title: 美国关系恶化，摩根大通和富国银行抛售南非债券
item.description: 富兰克林资源公司（Franklin Resources Inc.）、摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）和富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）等机构投资者本季度纷纷抛售南非债券，造成资金外流，其速度为 5 月份大选前所未见。【原文：Franklin Resources Inc., JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Wells Fargo & Co. are among institutional investors that have dumped South African bonds this quarter, fueling outflows at a rate not seen since before elections in May.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税前日本贸易顺差回升
item.description: 在主要出口国担心与美国贸易失衡的高度不确定时期，日本上个月的贸易收支在多种信号交织的情况下重新转为顺差。【原文：Japan’s trade balance switched back into surplus last month amid several mixed signals — the value of shipments abroad grew while imports unexpectedly fell — during a period of high uncertainty for major exporters worried about imbalances with the US.】

item.title: Cyan Banister、Arielle Zuckerberg 事务所融资 1.818 亿美元支持 "神奇的怪人
item.description:
长征风险投资公司（Long Journey Ventures）培养了人们对非主流初创企业的兴趣。【原文：

Long Journey Ventures has nurtured an appetite for off-beat startups. 

】

item.title: 加拿大顶级电信公司警告贸易战将加剧无线设备挑战
item.description: 加拿大收入最大的电信公司警告说，长期的贸易战将拖累经济增长，而国内移民目标的下降已经阻碍了经济增长。【原文：Canada’s largest telecom company by revenue warned that a prolonged trade war will drag on economic growth, which was already hampered by a drop in domestic immigration targets.】

item.title: 飙升的医疗费用引发共和党对交易的反击
item.description: 得克萨斯州共和党人詹姆斯-弗兰克（James Frank）是一个小政府保守派，他以反对官僚主义为己任。但在医疗保健方面，这位北德克萨斯州的立法者对不断上涨的成本感到非常震惊，因此他希望州政府能加强对兼并的监督。【原文：Texas Republican James Frank is a small-government conservative who has made it his mission to fight bureaucracy. But when it comes to health care, the North Texas lawmaker is so alarmed by rising costs that he wants greater state oversight of mergers.】

item.title: 监督机构称 Paragon 间谍软件工具与加拿大警方有关
item.description: 据多伦多大学的网络安全研究人员称，加拿大一家执法机构涉嫌使用间谍软件入侵手机并窃听信息。【原文：A Canadian law enforcement agency is suspected to have used spyware designed to hack into mobile phones and eavesdrop on messages, according to cybersecurity researchers from the University of Toronto.】

item.title: 印度能源公司 Greenko 创始人获得私人贷款承诺
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度清洁能源生产商绿科能源控股公司（Greenko Energy Holdings）的创始人已获得至少五家贷款机构的承诺，他们将寻求8亿美元的私人信用贷款，用于收购该公司的股份。【原文：Founders of Indian clean energy producer Greenko Energy Holdings have received commitments from at least five lenders as they seek an $800 million private credit loan for a stake purchase in the firm, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 钻井，宝贝，钻井 "的口号将削弱美国液化天然气出口的竞争力
item.description:
特朗普决心让石油变得更便宜，这可能会给天然气的海外销售带来一些意想不到的后果。【原文：

Trump’s determination to make oil cheaper may have some unintended consequences for gas sales abroad.

】

item.title: 障碍重重，Orcel 进一步推迟德国商业银行的决定
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）首席执行官安德里亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）表示，在德国商业银行的股价反弹使潜在交易变得更加昂贵之后，意大利联合信贷银行可能要等几年才能决定对德国商业银行的全面收购要约。【原文：UniCredit SpA may wait years before deciding on an all-out takeover offer for Commerzbank AG, Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel said, after a rally in the stock of the German rival made a potential deal more expensive.】

item.title: 斯沃琪首席执行官称瑞士制表商需要 "时间 "实现私有化
item.description: 斯沃琪集团（Swatch Group AG）首席执行官尼克-海耶克（Nick Hayek）表示，斯沃琪集团正在研究将这家瑞士制表商私有化的可能性，但这 "需要时间"。【原文：Swatch Group AG is looking into a potential take-private of the Swiss watchmaker but it will “take time,” according to Chief Executive Officer Nick Hayek.】

item.title: 博洛雷面临数十亿美元非洲物流销售款被没收的诉讼
item.description: 博洛雷公司（Bolloré SE）在法国遭到投诉，要求没收 2022 年出售一家涉嫌腐败的运输和物流企业所得的数十亿欧元，并将其转交给非洲当地社区。【原文：Bolloré SE has been hit by a complaint in France that seeks to confiscate billions of euros from the 2022 sale of an allegedly corrupt transport and logistics business and put it into the hands of local communities in Africa.】

item.title: 美联储将与企业和消费者一起进入观望模式

item.title: 经历多年挫折后，投资者涌向机器人初创企业
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Jackie Davolos 报道风险资本投资机器人初创企业的新一轮热潮。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Jackie Davolos reports on the renewed surge in venture capital investing in robotics startups.】

item.title: 私募股权公司正在抛售股权
item.description:
公司急于举债，以便向收购基金的所有者支付高额酬金。这使得私募股权投资行业的参与度越来越低。【原文：

Companies are rushing to raise debt to make hefty payouts to their buyout-fund owners. It’s leaving the PE industry with less skin in the game.

】

item.title: 决策指南：瑞典央行利率视角转向加息
item.description: 瑞典政策制定者本周将继续按兵不动，巩固在通胀突然飙升将加息幽灵重新提上议事日程后停止宽松政策的局面。【原文：Swedish policymakers are set to keep their interest rate on hold this week, cementing a halt to easing after a sudden surge in inflation brought the specter of hikes back onto the agenda.】

item.title: 关税风险引发运往美国港口的铜货量创历史新高
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在全球范围内抢先征收潜在关税，美国即将涌入大量铜矿。【原文：The US is about to be flooded with a massive wave of copper as a worldwide dash to front-run potential tariffs by US President Donald Trump comes to a head.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率九周来首次上调
item.description: 美国 30 年期抵押贷款平均利率自 1 月初以来首次上升，导致再融资减少，购房活动受到抑制。【原文：The average US 30-year mortgage rate rose for the first time since early January, causing a pullback in refinancing and tempering purchase activity.】

item.title: 货币政策委员会主席马斯洛夫斯卡称波兰可能在 2026 年初之前降息
item.description: 政策制定者加布里埃拉-马斯洛夫斯卡（Gabriela Maslowska）表示，由于能源价格和宽松的财政政策，波兰的通胀风险将持续存在，这将把降息推迟到 2025 年底或明年初。【原文：Polish inflation risks are set to persist due to energy prices and loose fiscal policy, pushing back interest rate cuts until late in 2025 or early next year, according to policymaker Gabriela Maslowska.】

item.title: 关注特朗普，非洲经济体重新评估利率走势
item.description: 南非、埃及和其他几个非洲国家的央行将在下个月公布利率，并制定不同的方法来应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的保护主义政策带来的风险。【原文：Central banks in South Africa, Egypt and several other African nations will pronounce on interest rates over the course of the next month and stake out different approaches to counter the risks posed by US President Donald Trump’s protectionist policies.】

item.title: 瑞银客户称其妻子与财富顾问同居。事情变得一团糟
item.description: 当理查德-卡尔曼（Richard Kallman）长达 26 年的婚姻失败时，他来到了一个解决分居问题的会议，本以为会见到妻子和她的律师。但是，这对夫妇来自瑞银集团的新财富经理却出现了，并要求卡尔曼交出 900 万美元。【原文：When Richard Kallman’s 26-year marriage failed, he arrived at a meeting to hash out the separation, expecting to see his wife and her lawyer. But instead, the couple’s new wealth manager from UBS Group AG showed up and demanded Kallman fork over $9 million.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷前风险主管华纳因莫桑比克事件被罚款
item.description: 瑞士信贷（Credit Suisse）前首席风险与合规官拉拉-华纳（Lara Warner）因未能履行与莫桑比克金枪鱼捕捞船队融资丑闻有关的洗钱报告义务，被瑞士当局罚款 10 万瑞士法郎（约合 11.4 万美元）。【原文：Lara Warner, former chief risk and compliance officer at Credit Suisse, was fined 100,000 Swiss francs ($114,000) by Swiss authorities for failing to meet money-laundering reporting obligations tied to the Mozambique tuna-fishing fleet financing scandal.】

item.title: 三星誓要在人工智能内存市场夺回一席之地
item.description: 三星电子公司承诺今年将加强其在高带宽存储芯片市场的地位，以回应股东对其在利润丰厚的人工智能领域表现不佳的批评。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. pledged to strengthen its position in the high-bandwidth memory chip market this year, in response to shareholder criticism over its underperformance in the lucrative artificial intelligence arena.】
